events.name: Preview Talk - StackUp
events.description:
GET STARTED IN TECH NOW
Do you want to be a developer or an engineer? Are you curious about the tech industry?Join us for our Preview Talk! We will be conducting a short brief on our course offerings and tracks available. Get to know more about our amazing community and the wonderful stuff that we do. Our staff will also be around to answer your queries.If you have been thinking about transitioning to a tech-related career, let us help you get started.
For more on StackUp's course offerings and tracks, click here.
events.location: Institute of Systems Science, National University of Singapore, 25 Heng Mui Keng Terrace, Singapore 119615

events.name: Social Coding
events.description: A space for women coders to learn from each other, to practice and discuss learnings with fellow peers. This would be a weekly event of informal space to do coding. So bring your pet projects along or join one of our existing teams/ projects to work on. Featured Projects:https://trello.com/b/kl2BTwil/wwc-sg-social-coding-projects First timers, please read:Newbies Step-by-step Guide Please bring your own laptop. Agenda:6:30p - Registration and Introduce projects7:00p - Break out into groups and Start coding! ^_^8:30p - End session There is no food provided, so please make preparations to grab a bite before you turn up. Also, we recommend to bring your own water bottle along. Psst, this event is intended for ladies only. Host:
events.location: #03-04, IDA Labs@NDC 111 Middle Road, National Design Centre, Singapore 188969., IDA Labs@NDC 111 Middle Road, National Design Centre

events.name: Chef Meetup Singapore - Automating Compliance
events.description: You're invited to attend the Next Chef Singapore Meetup! It will be a deep dive workshop on the capabilities of Chef Automate with a special focus on compliance automation.   Together we will focus on how Chef Automate can help you manage scale and complexity in an environment. You will learn how the Chef Automate platform will increase speed, improve efficiency and decrease risk, highlighting infrastructure, application and compliance automation. Bring your laptop and come cut code with Chef!
events.location: Microsoft Singapore, Level 22, Room CF12, One Marina Boulevard, Singapore 018989

events.name: HackerNest Singapore Tech Social
events.description:
HackerNest Tech Socials are a fun, relaxed way to connect with your local tech community. Atmosphere: chill, friendly, unpretentious, agenda-free (no sales pitch), and brimming with Ultra Smart People.  Follow us on Twitter and Instagram, like us on Facebook, hi-5 us in person! The typical Tech Social agenda:   - folks arrive, grab drinks, socialize   - quick announcements, thank sponsors   - back to chatting   - head home, exhilarated from great conversations!   *** HackerNest Tech Socials are Entry by Donation - any amount appreciated, $5SGD recommended. No amount is too little! If a cash donation is too restrictive, please join us anyway – just let us know at the door. *** SPONSOR: </a><a href="http://hackernest.com/sponsor_info/">Sponsors make this growing movement possible, so we treasure and build deep, long-term relationships with the companies that endorse us. Please email [masked] for ways to connect with the HackerNest community! VENUE: SpaceMob https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/lMggn2yR9slSwfWK4Q94fkHxxwo8q7QP0WCemqumA31eUC6SBXhUj0VIcqGXqkXptEnlymLCz2LMDSyyqKPLzj_t09EfP6yJh2vdalpp0kWCqU-gSqTLLx2EzX4xGNRDg6zsNH7j Tucked amidst lush greenery and perfect for those who want to sit down and get to work. It's conveniently located next to Kent Ridge MRT station, in close proximity to key research and tertiary institutions, R&D, high-tech innovation and start-up communities. You'll love it, and so do we. We're on the lookout for easy to access offices with space that can fit our audience (standing-room only). Please email [masked] (or organizer email) if you’d like to host a Tech Social! COMMUNITY PARTNER: https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/rVmaLfgG-xe9EneBmR2bRkz53H2oglyvddiwtyiScZGIU1l_8pN4niQEabgbmy4HZThgvwYU9jzRNElbUG2Hew7k-n5bWb7VraKlRh5pMUKbT6dDVt7hkRknvHNQfv7Ku0rzzwyg InternSG connect passionate learners to budding entrepreneurs and businesses for work experiences. They endeavor to support communities organisation like HackerNest to pool like-minded individuals with multidisciplinary skills in solving real world problems. COMMUNITY EVENTS:  #codeathon is a learning-intensive hackathon with the theme of "Technopreneurship for Gender Equality". Our goal is to empower complete beginners to prototype tech solutions using tools such as MIT App Inventor and the standard web stack (HTML/CSS+Bootstrap and JavaScript). Register http://bit.ly/codeathonmentor by July 18! All Day DevOps  


On October 24th, HackerNest will be supporting the Live Online All Day DevOps Conference. This is a 24 hour event with 5 simultaneous tracks, 96 sessions and 4 keynotes in 38 time zones! There are featured guest speakers galore and frankly, far too much information to list, so check out this link instead! Oh, and did we mention that the entire thing is free?  QuantCon Singapore  We’re happy to be partnering with Quantopian for QuantCon Singapore, Quantopian’s quantitative finance and algorithmic trading conference. The second annual conference in Singapore is on September 28th-30th 2017.  To register or find out more, click here. Use discount code HackerNestSG for 10% off! If you’re a Community or Meetup group looking to promote an event or discount for HackerNest members, please email [masked]. About us: </a><a href="http://hackernest.com/">HackerNest is an international nonprofit uniting local tech communities through unpretentious Tech Socials, hackathons, Tech Expos and Job Fairs. Our relaxed, down-to-earth events attract a diverse and highly technical membership. Strict 'no-scuzzbag' policy. Want to volunteer at our HackerNest Tech Socials? Visit http://hackernest.com/volunteer/ for more information and to apply!
